name: Dan ar Braz
description: '''Daniel Le Bras''' (born 15 January 1949), known by his stage name '''Dan Ar Braz''' ({{IPA|br|ˈdãːnː ar ˈbrɑːs}}), is a [[Breton people|Breton]] guitarist-singer-composer and the founder of [[Héritage des Celtes|L'Héritage des Celtes]], a 50-piece [[Pan-Celticism|Pan-Celt]] band. As a leading guitarist in [[Celtic music]] band, he recorded as a soloist with [[Celtic harp]] player [[Alan Stivell]]. He also represented France in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 1996]].
